Package Sprites.Enemies

Class Enemy

java.lang.Object
Sprites.Sprite
Sprites.Enemies.Enemy
All Implemented Interfaces:
Object
Direct Known Subclasses:
Ghost, Mushroom
public abstract class Enemy extends Sprite
Abstract class representing a generic enemy. Handles movement, attack logic, and interaction with the player.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    protected int
    sound
    Sound effect ID to play when attacking.
    protected int

    Maximum distance along X-axis before switching to vertical movement.
    protected int
    yAttackDistance
    Maximum distance along Y-axis before initiating attack.
